species.name: zebstrika
descriptions: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
This ill-tempered Pokémon is dangerous because when it’s angry, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

abilities.name: lightning-rod
abilities.effect: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

abilities.name: motor-drive
abilities.effect: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.
